product.text:
Christmas in the Country

The true spirit of Christmas and the joy of giving are delightfully portrayed in this Disney classic featuring Scrooge McDuck, Donald and his nephews, and Daisy. Known for his miserly ways, Scrooge has a change of heart, demonstrating generosity and compassion to ensure that Donald and his family have a merry Christmas. The book’s underlying message serves as a reminder of the importance to give to those less fortunate and to empathize with the feelings of others.

Tie-in Activity: Inspired by Scrooge McDuck’s generosity, encourage your child to sift through his toy box, gather things he no longer plays with, and then clean and sort the toys for donation. Explain to your child how his thoughtfulness will bring joy to another child. Together, brainstorm more ideas for ways to be charitable.
